verses.roman:
ei-rūpa daśa-rātri rāmānanda-saṅge
sukhe goṅāilā prabhu kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge

synonyms: ei-rūpa—in this way; daśa-rātri—ten nights; rāmānanda saṅge—with Śrī Rāmānanda Rāya; sukhe—in great happiness; goṅāilā—passed; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge—in transcendental pleasure by discussing talks of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: For ten nights Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Rāmānanda Rāya spent a happy time discussing the pastimes of Kṛṣṇa.
